data.sentence: The word مِنَ comes from the root م ن and is associated with the meanings: From

data.meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Nun) To be, exist, happen, occur, take place, become, be such or so.
data.sentence: The word فَكَانُوا comes from the root ك و ن and is associated with the meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Nun) To be, exist, happen, occur, take place, become, be such or so.

data.meanings: To lie, say what is not a fact, lie to falsely invent, tell lies about or against, fabricate a lie, relate a lie, say a falsehood, be wrong, be cut off, deceive, disappoint the expectation of.
data.sentence: The word فَكَذَّبُوهُمَا comes from the root ك ذ ب and is associated with the meanings: To lie, say what is not a fact, lie to falsely invent, tell lies about or against, fabricate a lie, relate a lie, say a falsehood, be wrong, be cut off, deceive, disappoint the expectation of.

data.meanings: to die, perish, wasted, be lost, destroyed, spoiled.
data.sentence: The word الْمُهْلَكِينَ comes from the root ه ل ك and is associated with the meanings: to die, perish, wasted, be lost, destroyed, spoiled.
